page.title: 14The Henley May Fair Cont.
page.content: Each year the Committee choose the themes for the Fancy dress at the meeting by voting.She enjoys the acts very much.They have to contact the police to block the roads which costs 70 pounds. There are normaly about 40 stalls organised by various town groups. They sell cakes, jewellery and books.There are also competitions.Some of the money raised helps to pay for the May Fair organisation.Different schools in the town arrange on entertainment which includes dancing round the May pole and country dancing.
